Text (#101)"}']

Knee Pain

Knee Pain/Knee Arthritis is the number 1 marketing condition in any market, on the majority of platforms. Why is that? Because when we are talking about the knee, it’s THE most used joint in the entire body. The knee is required to do everything in life; Walk, run, bike, stand for long periods, golf, and the list goes on and on. Most medical treatments out there today are addictive pain killers, cortisone injections, and knee replacement surgery. Having a program designed to treat knee pain and knee arthritis to get these people's lives back not only make you the “Go-To Clinic”, but it will create a dramatic increase in new patients through the door.

With our knee pain niche clinical business model you are able to streamline your acquisition process through automation, allowing you to work on the business and not in it. Our hybrid at-home/in-clinic program is designed for the patient to have the ability to treat themselves 75% at home, be educated from home, while coming into the office minimally, getting better clinical results with research-backed technologies.

The antiquated neuropathy model of coming in the office multiple times only puts strain on your staff, your time, your energy, your schedule and the patient. 

By using our hybrid model and practice automation strategies you will be able to combine knee pain with other niches when presented like gut health, weight loss, spinal degenerative conditions and more. This will allow you to offer better clinical programs, collect more money, all while working less.

"The number one cause of joint degeneration is obesity. Every pound you are overweight, puts 4 pounds of pressure on your weight bearing joints." Mayo Clinic
